name: angular-snippets
displayName: Angular 6 Snippets - TypeScript, Html, Angular Material, ngRx, RxJS & Flex Layout
description: Angular Snippets (TypeScript, Html, Angular Material, Flex Layout, ngRx, RxJS, PWA & Testing) Updated for v6.0.8

scripts.build: npm run build_snippets; npm run build_readme; npm run dups; npm run count;
scripts.build_snippets: npm run build_html; npm run build_typescript; npm run build_javascript; npm run build_json
scripts.build_readme: cat src/README_top.md > README.md; npm run generate_readme_table; cat src/README_bottom.md >> README.md;
scripts.build_html: cat dist/snippets.json | jq -c 'to_entries | map(select(.value.types | contains("html"))) | .[].value.body |= join("\n") | from_entries | {".text.html": .}' > snippets/html.json
scripts.build_typescript: cat dist/snippets.json | jq -c 'to_entries | map(select(.value.types | contains("typescript"))) | .[].value.body |= join("\n") | from_entries | {".source.ts": .}' > snippets/typescript.json
scripts.build_javascript: cat dist/snippets.json | jq -c 'to_entries | map(select(.value.types | contains("javascript"))) | .[].value.body |= join("\n") | from_entries | {".source.js": .}' > snippets/javascript.json
scripts.build_json: cat dist/snippets.json | jq -c 'to_entries | map(select(.value.types | contains("json"))) | .[].value.body |= join("\n") | from_entries | {".source.json": .}' > snippets/json.json
scripts.generate_readme_table: cat dist/snippets.json | grep 'prefix\|description' | sed -e "s/description//" | sed -e "s/prefix//" | sed -e 's/    "": "//' | sed -e 's/",//' | sed -e 'N;s/\n/ | /' | sed -e 's/$/ |/g' | sed -e 's/^/| /' | sort  >> README.md
scripts.dups: npm run dup_snippet; npm run dup_name
